original_text: But this is what it says in the Bible: ‘Send away the woman who is a slave and her son. That woman's son will never receive anything from his father. The son of the free woman will receive all those good things.’ See Genesis 21:10. Hagar's son was called Ishmael. Sarah's son was called Isaac. Hagar and Ishmael caused much trouble to Sarah and Isaac. But this is what it says in the Bible: ‘Send away the woman who is a slave and her son. That woman's son will never receive anything from his father. The son of the free woman will receive all those good things.’
korean_text: 그러나 성경이 무엇을 말하느냐 여종과 그 아들을 내쫓으라 여종의 아들이 자유 있는 여자의 아들과 더불어 유업을 얻지 못하리라 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But this is what it says in the Bible
Send away the woman who is a slave
That woman's son will never receive anything
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여인의 아들은 결코 아무것도 받지 못할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The son of the free woman
will receive all those good things
sentences.korean_translation: 그 모든 좋은 것들을 받을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Hagar and Ishmael caused much trouble
But this is what it says in the Bible
Send away the woman who is a slave
That woman's son will never receive anything
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여인의 아들은 결코 아무것도 받지 못할 것입니다

will receive all those good things
